home.title: Full Stack Developer

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects demonstrating my full-stack development skills, from backend infrastructure to modern frontend interfaces

serviapp.title: Servi App
serviapp.subtitle: AmericasIoT - Service Management Application
serviapp.description: Mobile service management application built with Angular, Ionic, and Supabase. Features real-time notifications and comprehensive service tracking capabilities for field operations.
responsibilities: Frontend development with Angular TypeScript and Ionic framework
View design and implementation with corresponding business logic
Backend development using Supabase for database and authentication
Push notification system implementation for real-time alerts
Integration of mobile-optimized UI/UX patterns
State management and data synchronization
Testing and deployment on mobile platforms

sims.title: SIM Management System
sims.subtitle: AmericasIoT - SIM Card Management System
sims.description: Complete SIM card management system using emnify API. Development of RESTful backend APIs and frontend for data management and export.
responsibilities: Backend RESTful APIs development using emnify documentation
Creation of proprietary SIM management system
Frontend development consuming services
Data export to Excel functionality
Integration with external emnify services

microSavings.title: Micro-Savings Platform
microSavings.subtitle: Financial Management System
microSavings.description: Complete savings management platform with VPS infrastructure, backend API, and modern frontend interface.
responsibilities: VPS management and configuration: Bind9, Nginx, PHP, MySQL, Node.js
Backend: API creation with Express and Sequelize
Frontend: Page design with React + Vite
API consumption through services using JavaScript
Complete infrastructure deployment and maintenance

microSavingsApi.title: Micro-Savings API
microSavingsApi.subtitle: RESTful API for Savings Management
microSavingsApi.description: RESTful API built with Node.js, Express, and Sequelize for a micro-savings application. Enables users to register, login, manage profiles, create savings goals, and track their savings with secure JWT authentication.
responsibilities: Backend API development with Express.js and MVC architecture
Database design and ORM implementation with Sequelize migrations
User authentication system with JWT and bcrypt password hashing
CRUD operations for users, savings goals, and savings records management
RESTful endpoint design for authentication, users, goals, and savings
Environment configuration management with dotenv
API testing and deployment setup

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
portfolio.subtitle: Professional Frontend Showcase
portfolio.description: Modern and responsive portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and professional experience. Features interactive UI components and smooth animations.
responsibilities: Complete frontend development using React and Material UI
Implementation of React Router for seamless navigation
Design of multiple interactive sections: Home, Projects, Skills, Contact, and CV
Creation of responsive layouts optimized for all devices
Integration of PDF viewer for resume display
Custom color theming with gradient effects and animations
Contact form implementation with validation
Skills showcase with progress bars and interactive tabs

onlineDegree.title: Online Degree System
onlineDegree.subtitle: UAS - Faculty of Computer Science Mazatlán, Academic Department
onlineDegree.description: Complete web system for digital management of degree applications, optimizing the workflow and reducing manual workload for the academic department.
responsibilities: Frontend and Backend design and development under MVC architecture
Database creation and connection using PHP and MySQL
Web interface implementation for managing degree requests digitally
Workflow optimization to streamline the process and reduce manual load

pushNotifications.title: Push Notifications System
pushNotifications.subtitle: Instituto Cultural de Occidente - Colegio Xaveriano de Mazatlán
pushNotifications.description: Implementation of push notification system for an educational institution, enabling real-time communication with students and staff through web notifications.
responsibilities: UI design and implementation for push notification management section
Service Worker configuration for notification handling
Integration of subscription and unsubscription logic
Testing and deployment of notification delivery system

gpsManagement.title: GPS & User Management Application
gpsManagement.subtitle: Focused on Resellers
gpsManagement.description: Mobile and web application for real-time management of GPS devices and users, with advanced features for resellers.
responsibilities: Development of CRUD modules for user and GPS device management
Barcode reader implementation using phone camera
REST API integration and consumption for real-time data handling
Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop devices
Development under SPA and PWA architecture, improving UX and enabling offline usage

googleMaps.title: React with Google Maps API
googleMaps.subtitle: Location Mapping Practice Project
googleMaps.description: Practice project to learn React Router and Google Maps API integration, featuring navigation between pages and an interactive map showing the Faculty of Computer Science UAS Mazatlán location.
responsibilities: Implementation of React Router for multi-page navigation
Integration of Google Maps API for location display
Creation of reusable components and routing structure
Development of Home, About, Contact, and Map pages
Material UI integration for consistent styling
Version control setup with Git and GitHub

deployManager.title: DeployManager
deployManager.description: A deployment management tool designed to streamline and automate server deployment processes. Features include deployment tracking, status monitoring, and automated deployment workflows.
responsibilities: Deployment automation and orchestration
Server status monitoring and tracking
Automated workflow management
Error logging and recovery mechanisms
Command-line interface for deployment operations

inventoryApi.title: Inventory API Python
inventoryApi.description: RESTful API for inventory management built with Python. Handles product management, stock tracking, and inventory operations. Demonstrates API design patterns and database integration.
responsibilities: RESTful API endpoint design and implementation
Product and inventory database management
Stock tracking and reporting functionality
Error handling and validation
API documentation and usage examples

weatherApp.title: Python Weather App
weatherApp.description: Weather application that fetches real-time weather data from APIs and displays forecasts. Shows integration with external APIs, data processing, and user interface creation.
responsibilities: Weather API integration and data fetching
Real-time weather data processing
User-friendly interface for weather display
Forecast calculation and analysis
Error handling for API requests

fileOrganizer.title: File Organizer
fileOrganizer.description: Automatic file organization tool that categorizes and sorts files based on type and metadata. Demonstrates file system operations, automation, and efficient data processing in Python.
responsibilities: File system scanning and analysis
Automatic file categorization by type
File sorting and organization logic
Metadata extraction and processing
Logging and operation tracking

notificationService.title: Push Notification Service
notificationService.subtitle: AmericasIoT - Backend Service
notificationService.description: Creation of backend service for push notifications using Node.js, Express, Supabase, and Triggers.
responsibilities: Backend service development with Node.js and Express
Integration with Supabase for data management
Implementation of triggers for automatic notifications
Push notification system configuration
Service testing and deployment

deployManagerSSH.title: Deploy Manager SSH
deployManagerSSH.subtitle: Python Desktop Application
deployManagerSSH.description: Desktop application developed in Python with PyQt6 that provides a simple and intuitive graphical interface for deploying files and folders to a remote server via SSH.
responsibilities: Graphical interface development with PyQt6
SSH connection management implementation
Authentication system with SSH keys
File and folder selection for deployment
Real-time progress bar
Persistent configuration in config.json
Logging system and connection testing

cvGeneratorFrontend.title: CV Generator - Frontend
cvGeneratorFrontend.subtitle: Professional CV Creation Web Application
cvGeneratorFrontend.description: Modern and comprehensive web application for creating, customizing, and exporting professional CVs. Features multiple templates (Harvard Classic, Harvard Modern, Oxford), 10+ color schemes organized by categories, bilingual system (ES/EN), light/dark mode, and PDF export. Architecture based on React + TypeScript with Redux Toolkit for state management.
responsibilities: Complete frontend development with React 18.3 and TypeScript 5.6
State architecture with Redux Toolkit 2.5
JWT authentication system with refresh tokens
Implementation of 3 professional CV templates
Customization system with 10 color schemes
Complete internationalization with react-i18next (ES/EN)
Light/dark theme implementation with Material-UI 6.2
Interactive dashboard with profile statistics
PDF export and preview system
Progressive Web App (PWA) with Workbox
Complete integration with RESTful backend API
Form validation and error handling
Responsive design optimized for all devices

mediaHunter.title: MediaHunter
mediaHunter.subtitle: Multimedia Content Search and Download
mediaHunter.description: Complete web application for searching and downloading free multimedia content (images, videos, audio, GIFs) from multiple sources. Full-stack architecture with React + Vite on frontend and Express + TypeScript on backend. Integrates 4 free APIs: Pexels, Pixabay, Giphy, and Freesound.
responsibilities: Frontend development with React 18, Vite, and Material UI v7.3.7
Backend development with Express and TypeScript
Integration of multiple APIs: Pexels, Pixabay, Giphy, Freesound
Unified search system across multiple sources
Implementation of filters by type, orientation, and sorting
Inline preview with video/audio player and lightbox
Direct download system with multiple quality options
Favorites functionality with localStorage
Persistent search history
Dark/light mode implementation
Bilingual internationalization (Spanish/English) with i18next
Mobile-first responsive design

cvGeneratorBackend.title: CV Generator - Backend API
cvGeneratorBackend.subtitle: RESTful API for CV Generation
cvGeneratorBackend.description: Complete RESTful API for managing and generating professional CVs. Robust system with JWT authentication, multiple templates, color customization, and PDF generation with Puppeteer. Includes 33 predefined skill categories, comprehensive Joi validation, rate limiting, Winston logging, and configured CORS. Deployed to production with PM2.
responsibilities: RESTful API development with Node.js and Express
MySQL database design and implementation with Sequelize ORM
Complete authentication system with JWT and refresh tokens
Implementation of 3 CV templates (Harvard Classic, Modern, Oxford)
Color scheme system with 10 professional options
Dynamic PDF generation with Puppeteer
33 predefined skill categories for different industries
Robust data validation with Joi across all endpoints
Security implementation: Helmet, CORS, Rate Limiting, Bcrypt
Logging system with Winston for development and production
Database migrations and seeders
Complete profile management: personal info, experience, education, skills, languages, certifications
Production deployment with PM2 and VPS configuration
Complete API documentation and usage guides
